title: First Time got banned from RIOT because of abusive. So confused.
body:
I'm not a native speaker. Today i played a game and met a salty elise. I said i got a lot of ganks from orrn and she said "loser". She is 1/0/0 and I am 3/1/0. I told her pushin but she didn't. Then she met zoe in jungle i went to help her and killed zoe. She said me stole her kill. But I deal all the damage on zoe she said "Deal more damage on u and kys" i reply "kys first" because of thos i got banned :)      I have the highest damage and kills, even a quadra kll.
At last I'm 16/11/0 and elise is 1/5/6. She only has 8600 damgae. 600 higher than taric.  I think my only "kys" will be absived? lol

This is chat
Game 1
Níflheímr: jesus
Níflheímr: 2 bad waves
Níflheímr: bro
Níflheímr: pushin!
Níflheímr: 1 kill saying to 3 kills :)
Níflheímr: loser?
Níflheímr: yes
Níflheímr: i also got 4 times ganks from orrn
Níflheímr: did u?
Níflheímr: lol
Níflheímr: lmao
Níflheímr: i deal all the damage
Níflheímr: kys first
Níflheímr: elise
Níflheímr: kys
Níflheímr: ????
Níflheímr: wtf?
Níflheímr: terrible
Níflheímr: what i can do
Níflheímr: to this jg and top?
Níflheímr: our team combo better than them
Níflheímr: late game same
Níflheímr: but
Níflheímr: look this
Níflheímr: whatever join grp

replies.body: Jesus Christ will these posts EVER stop this is getting out of hand Riot?????

> [{quoted}](name=Fitzky,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=lFlNAuZY,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-11-23T09:37:39.353+0000)
>
> Jesus Christ will these posts EVER stop this is getting out of hand Riot?????

lol I have no idea who downvoted me.
It's also the first day I bought PROJECT vayne. I will lose all the project missions. How fun:)

native speaker or not, riot are coming down like a tonne of shit on any bad words.

I dont know why they dont just have a mute all button and be done with it.
